content: Wow, when did https://backdropcms.org/modules get a visual overhaul? Looks good!
The themes listing page is even cooler, with screenshots and everything: https://backdropcms.org/themes
@jenlampton ++
jenlampton (Karma: 12)
...now if we could get the search to work properly too :sweat:

@klonos Please review: https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/232

Fix ordering of add-on search results · Issue #232 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Searching for "devel", brings these results (Devel is listed 15th): Plupload Honeypot Backup and Migrate Mime Mail Automated Logout EU Cookie Compliance githubapi File Resumable Upload En...

Wow, when did https://backdropcms.org/modules get a visual overhaul? Looks good!

Wow indeed!
...now if we could get the search to work properly too :sweat:

And, for the billionth time, https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/487

Support a little more data in .info files · Issue #487 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
This is a spin-off from #100 I have added several fields to the project content types on backdropcms.org: unlimited value term reference field "Project Tags" -- the list of tags has been ...
@docwilmot Haven't looked at that issue, but how does that help with search?
Filter projects by tag, by dev name, by theme color, etc etc etc.
Ok. Depends then what @klonos was referring to re 'fixing' search - either the ordering of results, or adding extra filters, or both.
I was referring to fixing the search results, so that when I search for a module by name, it comes up at the top of the list.

...but I'm supportive of https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/487 too, because it'll allow us to do other interesting/useful things.

Support a little more data in .info files · Issue #487 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
This is a spin-off from #100 I have added several fields to the project content types on backdropcms.org: unlimited value term reference field "Project Tags" -- the list of tags has been ...
...the search results thing though is a nasty UX bug, so that should be prioritized.
I know it's not strictly the same issue, just another plug for a long standing wish.
Maybe this is a good issue for someone to advocate for this release cycle and put on the agenda for an upcoming DEV meeting.
I literally laughed. Never thought of that. We can advocate for non core things?
Sure, why not? :smiley:
Consider this (the issue I mentioned that is) advocated then. I'll try and sneak off to a private space on a Thursday to personally speak on it. Good thoughts sirs.
You should update the issue then listing yourself as an advocate, if you haven't already

I was thinking that there was still a core component to this issue. But, even if there isn't, I still think the idea of "advocating" for BackdropCMS.org issue works. But, I guess we won't be able to milestone it. ;-)

I took a look a while ago. I think it's in the project module where there's a query doing a string search. I couldn't understand why it wasn't producing better results but I never got as far as trying to set it up

To help fix part of the problem with this page, can I get some eyes on https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/232 please? I suspect if no one objects we should just merge and push it live then see what feedback we get from people when they start using it. Thoughts @klonos @jenlampton ?

Fix ordering of add-on search results · Issue #232 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Searching for "devel", brings these results (Devel is listed 15th): Plupload Honeypot Backup and Migrate Mime Mail Automated Logout EU Cookie Compliance githubapi File Resumable Upload En...
What's the right PR now? @BWPanda

This one I think https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/pull/669/files

Issue #232: Fix ordering of add-on search results. by BWPanda · Pull Request #669 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Fixes #232
I was just confused because I don't have merge permissions on this project
@Herb That's the only PR for that issue I believe, so yes.
